txt.en: 'I ask of you to count my treasures. Not a gold shall be missing or someone will have to pay.'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Note: This quest is only available while the quest, The Fushaum Resolution, is underway.</rgb>

'Everything seems to be in order then. Your reward is keeping your life!'

Thâng sighs.

'You should appreciate a good jest now and again.'
Fushaum Bal South: The Bandit's Stash
The Haradrim bandit chief's stash can be found in Fushaum Bal South.\n\nYou should count the stash for Thâng to make sure it is all there.
Thâng can be found at Fushaum Bal South.\n\nYou should talk to Thâng.
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil men once under the command of Sauron.
